statements: SELECT * FROM document_history;
SELECT document_id, version_number, edit_description FROM document_history WHERE version_number > 1;
SELECT editor_id, edited_date FROM document_history WHERE document_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM document_history ORDER BY edited_date DESC;
SELECT document_id, version_number, editor_id FROM document_history WHERE edit_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM document_history WHERE version_number > 2 ORDER BY edited_date DESC;
SELECT document_id, version_number, edit_description FROM document_history WHERE editor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY version_number ASC;
SELECT document_id, editor_id, edited_date FROM document_history WHERE edit_description LIKE '%update%' AND version_number < 5;
SELECT document_id, version_number FROM document_history WHERE editor_id = '98765432-abcd-9876-ba98-876543210000' AND edited_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_edits FROM document_history WHERE editor_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '98765432-abcd-9876-ba98-876543210000');
SELECT * FROM document_edits;
SELECT editor_name, document_id, edit_timestamp FROM document_edits;
SELECT revision_timestamp, document_id, revision_number FROM document_revisions;
SELECT editor_name, edit_timestamp FROM document_edits WHERE document_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM document_revisions ORDER BY revision_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM document_edits WHERE editor_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY edit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT document_id, COUNT(id) AS total_edits FROM document_edits GROUP BY document_id HAVING total_edits > 5;
SELECT document_id, MAX(revision_number) AS latest_revision FROM document_revisions GROUP BY document_id;
SELECT * FROM document_revisions WHERE revision_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND revision_timestamp < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY document_id ASC, revision_number DESC;
SELECT editor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_edits FROM document_edits WHERE edit_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' GROUP BY editor_name ORDER BY total_edits DESC;
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT document_id, document_title FROM documents WHERE document_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM revisions ORDER BY revision_date DESC;
SELECT editor_name, COUNT(*) FROM revisions GROUP BY editor_name;
SELECT document_title, edit_timestamp FROM documents JOIN revisions ON documents.document_id = revisions.document_id WHERE revisions.editor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT document_id, document_title FROM documents WHERE document_title LIKE 'Introduction%';
SELECT revision_id, revision_date, editor_name FROM revisions WHERE revision_date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM edits WHERE editor_name = 'Alice' AND edit_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT e.edit_id, r.revision_date, e.editor_name, e.edited_content FROM edits e INNER JOIN revisions r ON e.revision_id = r.revision_id WHERE r.editor_name = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM documents ORDER BY document_name DESC;
SELECT document_name, content FROM documents WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author, revision_date FROM revisions WHERE revision_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT document_id, count(revision_id) as total_revisions FROM document_history GROUP BY document_id HAVING total_revisions > 5 ORDER BY total_revisions DESC;
SELECT * FROM documents JOIN revisions ON documents.document_id = revisions.document_id WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT document_id, document_name, content, created_at FROM documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_name, content FROM documents ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT d.document_name, r.revision_number, r.author, r.content FROM documents d JOIN revisions r ON d.document_id = r.document_id WHERE r.revision_number > 5;

SELECT d.document_name, a.author_name, dh.action, dh.action_date FROM documents d JOIN document_history dh ON d.document_id = dh.document_id JOIN revisions r ON r.revision_id = dh.revision_id JOIN authors a ON r.author = a.author_id;
SELECT MAX(r.revision_number) AS max_revision, d.document_name FROM documents d JOIN revisions r ON d.document_id = r.document_id GROUP BY d.document_name ORDER BY max_revision DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM documents ORDER BY created_timestamp DESC;
SELECT editor_id, editor_name, editor_email FROM editors LIMIT 5;
SELECT document_title, created_timestamp FROM documents WHERE document_id = 2;
SELECT revision_id, document_id, revision_timestamp FROM document_revisions WHERE editor_id = 3 ORDER BY revision_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM document_edit_history WHERE document_id = 1 ORDER BY edit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM documents WHERE document_id = 2;
SELECT editor_name, editor_email FROM editors WHERE editor_id = 3;
SELECT revision_content, revision_timestamp FROM document_revisions WHERE document_id = 4 ORDER BY revision_timestamp LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM revision_comments WHERE revision_id = 5 ORDER BY comment_timestamp DESC;
